bill_title: include State Brand Board investigators in Class B public safety membership in the South Dakota Retirement System.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to include State Brand Board investigators in Class B public safety membership in the South Dakota Retirement System. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That subdivision (18) of § 3-12-47 be amended to read as follows: (18) "Class B member," members who are justices, judges, state law enforcement officers, magistrate judges, municipal police officers, municipal firefighters, county sheriffs, deputy county sheriffs, and penitentiary correctional staff, parole agents, air rescue firefighters, campus security officers, court services officers, conservation officers, and park rangers , and brand board investigators ; Section 2. That § 3-12-47 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SUBDIVISION to read as follows: "Brand board investigator," an employee of the State Brand Board whose qualifications and duties are as provided in § 40-18-14; Section 3. That chapter 3-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: To determine the retirement benefits of brand board inspectors, for credited service earned prior to July 1, 2009, the benefits shall be calculated pursuant to § 3-12-91 unless the member has converted Class A service pursuant to § 3-12-130, and for credited service after June 30, 2009, the benefits shall be calculated pursuant to § 3-12-92.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
